      • Grammar

        public Grammar​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> variables,
               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> terminals,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> rules,
               java.lang.String startSymbol,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> order)
        Creates a grammar G = ( V,T,P,S )
        Parameters:
        variables - V a finite set of variables
        terminals - T a finite set of terminals
        rules - P a finite set of production rules
        startSymbol - S the start symbol
        order - an array representing the order to give to the variables
